text: Vadakannikaapuram is a railway station on the Palakkad–Pollachi line which is a branch line between Palakkad and Pollachi in the state of Kerala, India. ==History== The line was functioning completely between Palakkad Junction and Palakkad Town. The section of the line between Palakkad Town and Pollachi completed safety testing on 2 October 2015. The safety inspection that followed conversion of the track was completed on 7 October 2015. The line was approved for passenger train services by the Commissioner of Railway Safety on 8 October 2015. ==References== Category:Palakkad–Pollachi line Category:Railway stations in Coimbatore district Category:Palakkad railway division
title: Vadakannikaapuram railway station
